text: The Love Bug is a 1997 American television adventure comedy movie directed by Peyton Reed and is the fifth movie in the Herbie franchise. It stars Bruce Campbell, John Hannah, Alexandra Wentworth, Kevin J. O'Connor, Dana Gould, Harold Gould and was distributed by Walt Disney Television. == Other websites == * * * Category:1997 adventure movies Category:1997 comedy movies Category:American television movies Category:Herbie movies Category:Movies directed by Peyton Reed
title: The Love Bug (1997 movie)
